modules.title: What is AI?
modules.concept: AI = software that learns patterns and can generate text, images, music, or even video.

activities.label: Ask an AI anything (ChatGPT)
activities.prompt: Explain AI in one fun paragraph for a 12-year-old, with a real-life example from school.

activities.label: Try Google Gemini
activities.prompt: Give me 5 ways AI helps students learn faster. Use simple language and bullet points.

modules.title: Prompt Magic
modules.concept: A prompt is your instruction to the AI‚Äîclear prompts get better results.

activities.label: Improve a prompt (ChatGPT)
activities.prompt: Rewrite this weak prompt to make it specific and clear: 'Write something about oceans.' Then produce the improved result.

activities.label: Few-shot prompting (Claude)
activities.prompt:
Here are 2 examples of summaries:
1) Article: 'Volcanoes' ‚Üí Summary: 'Volcanoes are openings in Earth's crust...'
2) Article: 'Rainforests' ‚Üí Summary: 'Rainforests are dense forests...'
Now summarize this short article in 3 bullet points: 'Photosynthesis is how plants make food...'

modules.title: Music Generation
modules.concept: Music AIs learn patterns of rhythm and melody to compose new tunes from text prompts.

activities.label: Make a lo-fi study track (Suno)
activities.prompt: Create a 30-second lo-fi study track with gentle drums, warm bass, and soft piano.

activities.label: Ambient background loop (Mubert)
activities.prompt: Generate a calm, ambient background loop for reading‚Äîsoft pads, no vocals.

modules.title: Image Generation
modules.concept: Text-to-image models act like 'word painters'‚Äîthey turn descriptions into pictures.

activities.label: Create concept art (DALL¬∑E 3)
activities.prompt: A futuristic classroom in Singapore with holographic displays, bright natural light, and students collaborating‚Äîillustration style.

activities.label: Try open-source SD (Stable Diffusion Web)
activities.prompt: A cozy reading nook with plants and fairy lights, watercolor style.

activities.label: Game character design (Leonardo AI)
activities.prompt: Design a friendly robot sidekick for a space adventure game; full-body, turnaround sheet.

activities.label: Create stunning art (Midjourney)
activities.prompt: A magical library floating in the clouds, books flying around, golden sunset lighting, highly detailed fantasy art.

modules.title: Video Generation
modules.concept: Text-to-video models create short clips from prompts; timing, motion, and coherence matter.

activities.label: Watch Sora demos (OpenAI)
activities.prompt: After watching, describe one demo you saw and why it looks realistic.

activities.label: Make a short clip (Kling AI)
activities.prompt: A spaceship landing at Singapore's Marina Bay at sunset; cinematic camera sweep, 6‚Äì8 seconds.

activities.label: Alt option (Runway Gen)
activities.prompt: A cartoon cat teacher writing math formulas on a chalkboard; classroom setting, 5‚Äì8 seconds.

activities.label: Alt option (Pika)
activities.prompt: A rainy school courtyard with reflections; slow pan, 5‚Äì8 seconds.

modules.title: AI Coding Assistant
modules.concept: AI coding assistants autocomplete, explain, and debug‚Äîlike a helpful partner.

activities.label: Code in the browser (Replit)
activities.prompt: Create a simple HTML/JS page that asks for a radius and shows the circle area with 2 decimal places.

activities.label: Pair-program (Cursor)
activities.prompt: Generate a Python 'guess the number' game with 5 attempts and friendly hints.

activities.label: Try Copilot
activities.prompt: Explain this error, then fix it: 'TypeError: cannot read properties of undefined (reading length)'.

modules.title: AI Study Notes
modules.concept: AI can summarize, extract key points, and quiz you on documents you upload.

activities.label: Auto notes (NotebookLM)
activities.prompt: Import a short science article and ask for 5 key points + a 3-question quiz.

activities.label: Chat with PDFs (ChatPDF)
activities.prompt: Upload a short chapter and ask: 'Summarize in 5 bullets for a 7th grader.'

activities.label: Research helper (Perplexity)
activities.prompt: In 5 bullets, explain the water cycle with kid-friendly language and emojis.

modules.title: Local AI (Offline)
modules.concept: Running models locally improves privacy and works without internet (if hardware allows).

activities.label: GUI runner (LM Studio)
activities.prompt: Install LM Studio and run a small open-source chat model. Ask it: 'Give me 3 study tips.'

activities.label: CLI runner (Ollama)
activities.prompt: After installing, run: `ollama run llama3` then ask: 'Explain fractions with an example.'

modules.title: Voice & TTS
modules.concept: Text-to-speech turns writing into natural voices; some tools clone voice styles.

activities.label: Create a voiceover (ElevenLabs)
activities.prompt: Read this: 'Welcome to our AI Playground! Today we learn with music, images, and videos.'

activities.label: OpenAI TTS (Docs)
activities.prompt: Use any sample to generate a friendly narration for a 30-second school intro.

activities.label: Transcribe audio (Descript)
activities.prompt: Upload a short voice memo and convert it to text, then fix grammar with AI.

modules.title: AI & the Future (Safety)
modules.concept: AI is powerful‚Äîuse it responsibly: respect privacy, avoid deepfakes, and check sources.

activities.label: See fake faces
activities.prompt: Describe why this looks real and how we can detect it's AI generated.

activities.label: UNESCO resource
activities.prompt: List 3 safety tips for teens using AI tools online.
